title: # 298 - The Gundo Comedy Festival
description:
I sit down with Dave Williamson and Ryan Dalton live at The Gundo Comedy Festival!

 

This episode is brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $160 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast
